item.title: Nginx HTTP Caching and Compression
item.description: This is a blog post for posterity - I’m sure I’ll forget how I did this and will go hunting again! and I must definitely be the last guy on the planet to be setting up nginx! Nginx is pretty fast in itself. I use jekyll to power this site. So, when you’re reading this article, all the data is coming right off the hard disk - No databases, no queries, no lookups - simple fopen, read, stdoutâ€¦
